com.pump.graphics

Class BaselineGraphics2D

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Graphics
      • java.awt.Graphics2D
        • com.pump.graphics.AbstractGraphics2D
          • com.pump.graphics.BaselineGraphics2D

  • public class BaselineGraphics2D
extends AbstractGraphics2D
    This simply records the baselines that text is drawn at. These values are stored as Integers in the baselines field of this object.

      • drawString

        public void drawString(java.text.AttributedCharacterIterator aci,
                       float x,
                       float y)
        Description copied from class: AbstractGraphics2D
        Creates a TextLayout and calls TextLayout.draw(g,x,y).

        This way if the AttributedCharacterIterator represents several different fills, they'll be handled correctly.

        Overrides:
        drawString in class AbstractGraphics2D

      • getBaselines

        public int[] getBaselines()
        Returns all the baselines used for this Graphics2D.

        This class is very basic, and a baseline is recorded whether or not it falls inside the clipped area. Also rotated baselines are not recorded, because, well, they make things complicated.

        Returns:
        all the baselines used for this Graphics2D.
